current_challenge.title: Plastic-Free Grocery Day
current_challenge.description: For one entire day, commit to not using any single-use plastic while grocery shopping. Bring reusable bags, produce bags, and containers. Plan your meals in advance to avoid buying pre-packaged foods and opt for bulk items instead. Check labels and try to choose products with minimal or eco-friendly packaging.
current_challenge.impact: Reducing single-use plastics helps decrease plastic pollution, which harms marine life and ecosystems. Making this small change can lead to a deeper awareness of plastic consumption.
